content: Hello everyone, welcome to this course of Intellipod.
In the module 10 of this course, we will uncover the concepts of reinforcement learning.
We will cover concepts such as multi-armed banded problem, mark-off decision processes,
bell man equations, there will be concepts such as policies and value functions, the optimal
policies and optimal value functions, etc.
The objective is to familiarize you with the reinforcement learning so that you can identify
the model problems for this case and use the same to solve complex real life business
